tip.text: Best views of Shanghai and a chance to cool off your toes

tip.text: Superb environment, food courses well explained, fresh and inventive tasting menu with a generous wine pairing. Menu updated every month....to be continued ;)

tip.text: Best lounge worldwide. Great pre-flight cocktails to take the edge of the flight (or anything else that's bothering you), good quality free massage, excellent staff service-still the best way to fly!
Great old town, great food, great coastline, great prices....fantastic people....what's not to like

tip.text: Attractive hotel, nice cosy rooms and good food outlets. Very convenient for getting to WAPDA house in Lahore. Cosy little bar on the 3rd floor (an oasis) with a local single malt that wasn't bad
Great Japanese in Sakura. Comfortable hotel, with good gym and very friendly staff (exceptional service)
Stayed in the hotel for the interesting views....rooms very basic, food is ok and staff are nice and friendly
Nice deco and atmosphere, great service, good wine selection. But the food looks better than it tastes...
